channel.title: Making it where only certain p rights can hold bows
channel.description:
ive been working on this for idk...45 minutes or so...and i got the statements working...i just need to fix it where if they hold the bow and they dont have the right p rights then...it disappears. please tell me what i need to make it...heres an example.
[code] if(playerRights < 5 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 862) playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1; //<------- that is the line i need to change but idk what to make it. [/code]

ive been working on this for idk…45 minutes or so…and i got the statements working…i just need to fix it where if they hold the bow and they dont have the right p rights then…it disappears. please tell me what i need to make it…heres an example.

if(playerRights < 5 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 862)
